## RecordClass.has() method

Determines whether the current object has the specified property

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
has(key: string, value?: unknown): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  key | string | Name of the property to test |
|  value | unknown | Optionally specifies a value that shall be tested for equality |

<b>Returns:</b>

boolean
